comment: Edited to match the actual grain bill. hope to brew this on my new BIAB system tomorrow if we don't get rained out here in Redding CA.

Very good but I will make some change's next time. leave out the roasted barley, replace with chocolate malt. step the carafa III. replace nugget hop's with a less aggressive dual use hop's, only use a bitter addition. looking for a less bitter dark chocolate flavor.
